extDesc.message: An extension for manipulating tabs at certain times.

actionButtonEnableTitle.description: The title of the enable/disable button when disabled

actionButtonDisableTitle.description: The title of the enable/disable button when enabled

actionButtonBadgeEnabledText.description: The text of the badge hovering over the enable/disable button when its disabled

actionButtonBadgeDisabledText.description: The text of the badge hovering over the enable/disable button when its enabled
